title: Implement help overlay modal
description:
Implement renderHelpOverlay() function:

Triggered by pressing '?'
Modal overlay centered on screen

Content:
┌─ Keyboard Shortcuts ─────────────────┐
│                                      │
│  Navigation                          │
│  j/k, ↑/↓     Move up/down           │
│  g/G          Top/bottom             │
│  ^d/^u        Page down/up           │
│  tab          Switch pane            │
│                                      │
│  Actions                             │
│  p            Pause/Resume           │
│  ?            Toggle help            │
│  q            Quit                   │
│                                      │
│  Press any key to close              │
└──────────────────────────────────────┘

Styling:
- Dark background (surface color)
- Rounded border
- Pink header
- Gray text for descriptions
- Centered using placeOverlay() helper

Implement placeOverlay(fg, bg) that centers fg over bg preserving ANSI.
closed_reason: Implemented renderHelpOverlay() with custom formatted modal showing Navigation (j/k, ↑/↓, g/G, ^d/^u, tab) and Actions (p, ?, q) sections. Added placeOverlay() helper that centers fg modal over bg preserving ANSI by using ansi.Truncate/Cut. Updated key handler to close help on any key press. Also updated renderCompleteOverlay() to use placeOverlay for consistency. Added renderBaseView() to extract common layout code.
